title: Support newlines in property functions
body:
I'd like to be able to place chained property functions onto new lines like:

```xml
<PropertyA>
    $(SomeProperty
    .Substring(0, 3)
    .Trim())
</PropertyA>
```

Right now the evaluator will thrown an exception because the newlines are not valid.  If we trimmed the parsed method name, the newlines and whitespace would be discarded and these chained property functions would look nicer in projects.
